message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $110. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $112.50. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to go down to $108?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to work with you. I can offer it to you for $109. This is the last bit of wiggle room I have, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $107?
